jfxtras.labs.scene.control

Class BeanPathAdapter.FieldStringConverter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.util.StringConverter<T>
      • jfxtras.labs.scene.control.BeanPathAdapter.FieldStringConverter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the target class type that is used in the coercion of the string
    Enclosing class:
    BeanPathAdapter<B>

    protected static class BeanPathAdapter.FieldStringConverter<T>
extends javafx.util.StringConverter<T>
    Coercible <code>StringConverter</code> that handles conversions between strings and a target class when used in the binding process Bindings.bindBidirectional(Property, Property, StringConverter)
    See Also:
    <code>StringConverter</code>
